page.title: 16LEGBOURNE FLOWER FESTIVAL
page.content: {LEGBOURNE CHURCH In June 1985 Legbourne All Saints Church held a flower festival.Every organisation in the village designed a floral arrangement to represent a saint.Here is a list of saints and organisations:-George(Cubs),Mary (Mothers Union),David(Playing Field Assoc.),Patrick(Parish Council),Andrew (School Assoc.),Christopher(Cricket Club),Joan of Arc(Women's Institute), John the Baptist(Parochial Church Council),Hugh(Meals on Wheels),Cecilia (Village Hall Committee),Francis (Brownies),Nicholas(Playgroup),Luke (Forgetmenot Club),Valentine(Youth Club),James(Mrs.C.Harrison). Legbourne School painted pictures and wrote about saints to decorate the walls in the nave.This shows how all the organisations in Legbourne helped to make this a successful event.
